welcome_message_body: Welcome to Abuja, the vibrant capital city of Nigeria! Get ready to be charmed by its beautiful landscapes, rich culture, and warm hospitality. Explore and enjoy all that Abuja has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Yahuza Suya Spot
restaurants.description: Yahuza Suya Spot is a bbq joint located in Abuja.
restaurants.address: 48 Adetokumbo Ademola Crescent Wuse II, Abuja, Federal Capital Territory

restaurants.name: River Plate Garden
restaurants.description: River Plate Garden is a pizzeria located in Abuja.

restaurants.name: Tulip Bistro
restaurants.description: Tulip Bistro is a bistro located in Abuja.
restaurants.address: 7 Atakpame street (Off Adetokunbo Ademola), Abuja, Federal Capital Territory

restaurants.name: Papillion Restaurant
restaurants.description: Papillion Restaurant is a african restaurant located in Abuja.
restaurants.address: Sheraton Abuja (1 Ladi Kwali Way), Abuja, Maitama

restaurants.name: the secret garden
restaurants.description: the secret garden is a italian restaurant located in Abuja.
restaurants.address: Riverplate,  Durbun Street Garden Park (Ahmadu Bello Way), Abuja, Federal Capital Territory
